block.p: Catherine Anne Becker and Harry Richard Norman Jr. were married yesterday on the island of Virgin Gorda. The Rev. Lester G. Bowers, a Methodist minister, officiated at the nondenominational ceremony at Little Dix Bay, a resort near Spanish Town in the British Virgin Islands.

Ms. Becker, 34, is keeping her name. She works in New York as the producer of medical segments for ''Good Morning America'' on ABC-TV. She graduated from Northwestern and received a master's degree in public health from Columbia.

Catherine Anne Becker and Harry Richard Norman Jr. were married yesterday on the island of Virgin Gorda. The Rev. Lester G. Bowers, a Methodist minister, officiated at the nondenominational ceremony at Little Dix Bay, a resort near Spanish Town in the British Virgin Islands.

Catherine Anne Becker and Harry Richard Norman Jr. were married yesterday on the island of Virgin Gorda. The Rev. Lester G. Bowers, a Methodist minister, officiated at the nondenominational ceremony at Little Dix Bay, a resort near Spanish Town in the British Virgin Islands.

Ms. Becker, 34, is keeping her name. She works in New York as the producer of medical segments for ''Good Morning America'' on ABC-TV. She graduated from Northwestern and received a master's degree in public health from Columbia.

She is the daughter of Maureen and William L. Becker of Glen Ellyn, Ill. The bride's father is the general counsel at Harpo Inc., in Chicago. Her mother retired as a coordinator of computer training at the College of DuPage Business and Professional Institute, in Glen Ellyn.

Mr. Norman, 40, works in New York as a development executive with Buena Vista Productions, a television production unit of the Walt Disney Company; he works with writers, directors and producers to come up with new television shows. He graduated from West Chester University in Pennsylvania.
He is a son of Barbara and H. Richard Norman of Greensboro, Md. The bridegroom's father is a claims adjuster and an inspector for Bartlett, Griffin & Vermilye, an insurance agency in Easton, Md.
